alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 1:09AM PDT until March 28 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Jackson County. This includes Interstate 5 from Central Point south, including the cities of Medford, Phoenix, Talent and Ashland. Highway 62, including the cities of White City and Eagle Point, and portions of highway 140 east of White City. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to be strongest Monday night through Tuesday morning. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
